name: IChat
description:
A Game Good In It's Time, But There Are Now Only 11 Player Online!

A Game About A (mostly) Abandoned Social Game.

THE 11 PLAYERS ONLINE:

  • BaclavaLover (you)
  • SusDude
  • Greg
  • Jozzie
  • TownDude
  • LionKing2
  • Sandwich
  • WhereAreAllMyFriends
  • DefyingGravity
  • SniperDude
  • Nooblol

Any Speedruns Of This Game Have To Have Done These Things:

  • Have Interacted With Every Of The 11 Players Online (see list above)
  • Have Walked On Every Walkable Block
  • Have Collected Every Item
